action.action-desc: Mr. Estes introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Clean Air Act to prohibit the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency from imposing a fee on certain facilities for methane emissions.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Marginal Well Protection Act.

section.header: Methane emissions and waste reduction incentive program for petroleum and natural gas systems
